summary: Episodes about different stages of relationships: from flirtation to falling out of love.
cast: August Diehl|Chiara Schoras|Fritzi Haberlandt|Janek Rieke|Stipe Erceg|Sólveig Arnarsdóttir|Dale Dickey|Valur Freyr Einarsson|Bonnie Hellman|Brigitte Hobmeier|Jack Impellizzeri|Walter Kreye|Karina Plachetka|Christine Schorn|Jessica Schwarz|Maria Simon|Ina Weisse|Wotan Wilke Möhring
title: Nichts als Gespenster
